choose.when:
select
decode((substr(geocode,0,4)||'00'),#{code},(select desp from geocode g where g.code = (substr(geocode,0,4)||'00'))||'(本级)',(select desp from geocode g where g.code = (substr(geocode,0,4)||'00'))) as desp, (select decode(substr(code, 5, 2), '00', 0, g.dis_order) from geocode g where g.code = (substr(geocode,0,4)||'00')) as dis_order , sum(case when chaobz> 0 then chaobz else 0 end) as chaobz, sum(case when chaozs> 0 then chaozs else 0 end) as chaozs, sum(case when chaojg> 0 then chaojg else 0 end) as chaojg
from (select g.code as geocode, decode(jgtype, 'local', '主管部门', 'sy', '事业单位', 'lo_next', '下设机构', '街道乡镇') as jgsy_type, (synsjgs - pznsjgs) as chaojg, (case when jgtype = 'sy' then (qebk_zz + cebt_zz + jfzl_zz + ga_zz + jcy_zz + fy_zz + sf_zz + aq_zz) - (qebk_bz + cebt_bz + jfzl_bz + ga_bz + jcy_bz + fy_bz + sf_bz + aq_bz) else (qebk_zz + cebt_zz + jfzl_zz + dzq_zz + ga_zz + jcy_zz + fy_zz + sf_zz + aq_zz) - (qebk_bz + cebt_bz + jfzl_bz + dzq_bz + ga_bz + jcy_bz + fy_bz + sf_bz + aq_bz) end) chaobz, (l_r_l1_nu - l_a_l1_nu) as chaozs from geocode g left join v_bzzz v on g.code= v.geocode where geocode like #{depcode} ) where chaobz!=0 or chaozs!=0 or chaojg!=0 group by substr(geocode,0,4) order by substr(geocode,0,4)
choose.otherwise:
select decode(geocode,'360100',(select desp from geocode g where g.code = geocode)||'(本级)',(select desp from geocode g where g.code = geocode)) as desp, (select decode(substr(code, 5, 2), '00', 0, g.dis_order) from geocode g where g.code = geocode) as dis_order , sum(case when chaobz> 0 then chaobz else 0 end) as chaobz, sum(case when chaozs> 0 then chaozs else 0 end) as chaozs, sum(case when chaojg> 0 then chaojg else 0 end) as chaojg
from (select g.code as geocode, decode(jgtype, 'local', '主管部门', 'sy', '事业单位', 'lo_next', '下设机构', '街道乡镇') as jgsy_type, (synsjgs - pznsjgs) as chaojg, (case when jgtype = 'sy' then (qebk_zz + cebt_zz + jfzl_zz + ga_zz + jcy_zz + fy_zz + sf_zz + aq_zz) - (qebk_bz + cebt_bz + jfzl_bz + ga_bz + jcy_bz + fy_bz + sf_bz + aq_bz) else (qebk_zz + cebt_zz + jfzl_zz + dzq_zz + ga_zz + jcy_zz + fy_zz + sf_zz + aq_zz) - (qebk_bz + cebt_bz + jfzl_bz + dzq_bz + ga_bz + jcy_bz + fy_bz + sf_bz + aq_bz) end) chaobz, (l_r_l1_nu - l_a_l1_nu) as chaozs from geocode g left join v_bzzz v on g.code= v.geocode where geocode like #{depcode} ) where chaobz!=0 or chaozs!=0 or chaojg!=0 group by geocode order by geocode

mapper.select: select sum(zdzg) as zdzg,sum(bbzg) as bbzg,sum(zzzg) as zzzg from geo_azzgfs where depcode like #{depcode}

select nowmonth as nowmonth,nvl(m.xzqk,0) as xzqk,nvl(m.xhqk,0) as xhqk from (select to_char((add_months(sysdate - numtoyminterval(1, 'YEAR'), level)), 'yyyy/mm') nowmonth FROM DUAL connect BY LEVEL <= 12) month left join (select to_char(y.time, 'yyyy/mm') as time, sum(y.xzqk) as xzqk, sum(y.xhqk) as xhqk from geo_ywttz y where depcode like #{depcode}
group by to_char(y.time , 'yyyy/mm')) m on month.nowmonth = m.time ORDER BY month.nowmonth

select jgsy_name, jgsy_type, dep_name
, chaobz problem_num
, chaozs problem_num
, chaojg problem_num
from (select jgsy_code, jgsy_name, (select g.desp from geocode g where g.code = geocode) as dep_name, decode(jgtype, 'local', '主管部门', 'sy', '事业单位', 'lo_next', '下设机构', '街道乡镇') as jgsy_type, (synsjgs - pznsjgs) as chaojg, (case when jgtype = 'sy' then (qebk_zz + cebt_zz + jfzl_zz + ga_zz + jcy_zz + fy_zz + sf_zz + aq_zz) - (qebk_bz + cebt_bz + jfzl_bz + ga_bz + jcy_bz + fy_bz + sf_bz + aq_bz) else (qebk_zz + cebt_zz + jfzl_zz + dzq_zz + ga_zz + jcy_zz + fy_zz + sf_zz + aq_zz) - (qebk_bz + cebt_bz + jfzl_bz + dzq_bz + ga_bz + jcy_bz + fy_bz + sf_bz + aq_bz) end) chaobz, (l_r_l1_nu - l_a_l1_nu) as chaozs from v_bzzz) where jgsy_code like #{depCode}
and chaobz > 0
and chaozs > 0
and chaojg > 0
order by jgsy_code
